service.sql: select (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') ny, sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price) ntip1, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) wbgpa2, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_price) wbssp4, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_amount) wbssa5, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_price) wbiop8, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_amount) wbioa9, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_price) wwbrsp10, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_amount) wbrsa11, sum(win_bid_cardboard_price) wbcp12, sum(win_bid_cardboard_amount) wbca13, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_price) wbcp14, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_amount) wbca15, sum(win_bid_other_material_cost) womc16, sum(win_bid_material_total) wbmt17 from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS zb, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_DETAILS sd, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_COMPLETION_DETAILS wg where wg.code = sd.code and wg.code = zb.code and (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') in ${dates} and wg.company_name in ${dwmcs} group by completion_year, completion_month

select '合计', sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price) ntip1, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) wbgpa2, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_price) wbssp4, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_amount) wbssa5, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_price) wbiop8, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_amount) wbioa9, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_price) wwbrsp10, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_amount) wbrsa11, sum(win_bid_cardboard_price) wbcp12, sum(win_bid_cardboard_amount) wbca13, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_price) wbcp14, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_amount) wbca15, sum(win_bid_other_material_cost) womc16, sum(win_bid_material_total) wbmt17 from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS zb, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_DETAILS sd, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_COMPLETION_DETAILS wg where wg.code = sd.code and wg.code = zb.code and (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') in ${dates} and wg.company_name in ${dwmcs}

select (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') ny, sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price) ntip1, sum(op_gross_profit_amount) ogpa2, sum(op_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3, sum(op_quantity_of_silicon_steel) wbssp4, sum(op_unit_price_of_silicon_steel) wbssa5, sum(op_copper_price) wbiop8, sum(op_amount_of_copper) wbioa9, sum(op_unit_price_of_transformer_oil) wwbrsp10, sum(op_transformer_oil_consumption) wbrsa11, sum(op_cardboard_unit_price) wbcp12, sum(op_amount_of_cardboard) wbca13, sum(op_steel_price) wbcp14, sum(op_steel_dosage) wbca15, sum(op_other_materials) womc16, sum(op_total_tax_material) wbmt17 from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS zb, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_DETAILS sd, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_COMPLETION_DETAILS wg where wg.code = sd.code and wg.code = zb.code and (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') in ${dates} and wg.company_name in ${dwmcs} group by completion_year, completion_month

select '合计', sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price) ntip1, sum(op_gross_profit_amount) ogpa2, sum(op_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3, sum(op_quantity_of_silicon_steel) wbssp4, sum(op_unit_price_of_silicon_steel) wbssa5, sum(op_copper_price) wbiop8, sum(op_amount_of_copper) wbioa9, sum(op_unit_price_of_transformer_oil) wwbrsp10, sum(op_transformer_oil_consumption) wbrsa11, sum(op_cardboard_unit_price) wbcp12, sum(op_amount_of_cardboard) wbca13, sum(op_steel_price) wbcp14, sum(op_steel_dosage) wbca15, sum(op_other_materials) womc16, sum(op_total_tax_material) wbmt17 from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS zb, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_DETAILS sd, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_COMPLETION_DETAILS wg where wg.code = sd.code and wg.code = zb.code and (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') in ${dates} and wg.company_name in ${dwmcs}

select (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') ny, sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price) ntip1, sum(actual_gross_profit) ogpa2, sum(actual_gross_profit) / nullif(sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3, sum(actual_price_of_silicon_steel) wbssp4, sum(actual_amount_of_silicon_steel) wbssa5, sum(copper_price) wbiop8, sum(actual_electrolytic_copper_consumption) wbioa9, sum(actual_transformer_oil_unit_price) wwbrsp10, sum(actual_transformer_oil_consumption) wbrsa11, sum(actual_insulation_board_price) wbcp12, sum(actual_insulation_board_usage) wbca13, sum(actual_steel_price) wbcp14, sum(actual_steel_consumption) wbca15, sum(actual_cost_of_other_materials) womc16, sum(total_material_cost) wbmt17 from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS zb, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_DETAILS sd, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_COMPLETION_DETAILS wg where wg.code = sd.code and wg.code = zb.code and (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') in ${dates} and wg.company_name in ${dwmcs} group by completion_year, completion_month

select '合计', sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price) ntip1, sum(actual_gross_profit) ogpa2, sum(actual_gross_profit) / nullif(sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3, sum(actual_price_of_silicon_steel) wbssp4, sum(actual_amount_of_silicon_steel) wbssa5, sum(copper_price) wbiop8, sum(actual_electrolytic_copper_consumption) wbioa9, sum(actual_transformer_oil_unit_price) wwbrsp10, sum(actual_transformer_oil_consumption) wbrsa11, sum(actual_insulation_board_price) wbcp12, sum(actual_insulation_board_usage) wbca13, sum(actual_steel_price) wbcp14, sum(actual_steel_consumption) wbca15, sum(actual_cost_of_other_materials) womc16, sum(total_material_cost) wbmt17 from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS zb, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_DETAILS sd, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_COMPLETION_DETAILS wg where wg.code = sd.code and wg.code = zb.code and (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') in ${dates} and wg.company_name in ${dwmcs}

select (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') ny, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) * 100.0 mll3, sum(op_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) * 100.0 mll4, sum(actual_gross_profit) / nullif(sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) * 100.0 mll5 from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS zb, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_DETAILS sd, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_COMPLETION_DETAILS wg where wg.code = sd.code and wg.code = zb.code and (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') in ${dates} and wg.company_name in ${dwmcs} group by completion_year, completion_month

if.sql: select (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') ny, sum(actual_gross_profit) / nullif(sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) * 100.0 mll3 from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS zb, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_DETAILS sd, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_COMPLETION_DETAILS wg where wg.code = sd.code and wg.code = zb.code and (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') in ${dates} and wg.company_name = ${CompanyType.SBGS.value} group by completion_year, completion_month

select (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') ny, sum(actual_gross_profit) / nullif(sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3 from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS zb, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_DETAILS sd, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_COMPLETION_DETAILS wg where wg.code = sd.code and wg.code = zb.code and (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') in ${dates} and wg.company_name = ${CompanyType.HBGS.value} group by completion_year, completion_month

select (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') ny, sum(actual_gross_profit) / nullif(sum(wg.not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3 from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS zb, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_DETAILS sd, JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_COMPLETION_DETAILS wg where wg.code = sd.code and wg.code = zb.code and (convert(varchar(10), completion_year) + '年' + convert(varchar(10), completion_month) + '月') in ${dates} and wg.company_name = ${CompanyType.XBC.value} group by completion_year, completion_month
